A Technique for Machine-Aided Indexing .A Klingbiel, Paul H. Subject indexing of text can, in principle, be accomplished in many ways.. The technique for machine-aided indexing (MAI) developed at the Defense Documentation Center (DDC) is illustrated on a randomly chosen abstract.. Additional text is provided in coded form so that the reader can more fully explore this technique and form his own opinion of the applicability and versatility of this particular procedure..
